Posts.Content: I was diagnosed on 1/4 & scheduled to have a mastectomy on 18/5 & had to go for my pre-op assessment yesterday. Up until this morning I feel as though I've had everything sorted in my mind (apart from stressing about surgery paper knickers which due to my size I'm convinced won't fit me!) but this morning I've had a complete meltdown- I've cried & feel if I start crying again I won't stop. I'm trying to be strong as my husband had a mini-stroke at the end of January. I know I'm being silly but just needed to tell someone
